thread.title: BRIEF-Triangle Capital Qtrly ‍Net Asset Value Per Share $13.43​

title: BRIEF-Triangle Capital Qtrly ‍Net Asset Value Per Share $13.43​
text: February 28, 2018 / 9:27 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Triangle Capital Qtrly ‍Net Asset Value Per Share $13.43​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 28 (Reuters) - Triangle Capital Corp: * TRIANGLE CAPITAL CORPORATION REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND ANNOUNCES QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.30 PER SHARE * TRIANGLE CAPITAL CORP - ‍TOTAL INVESTMENT INCOME DURING Q4 OF 2017 WAS $31.7 MILLION, COMPARED TO TOTAL INVESTMENT INCOME OF $29.9 MILLION FOR Q3 OF 2017​ * TRIANGLE CAPITAL CORP QTRLY ‍NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE (BOOK VALUE) $13.43​ * TRIANGLE CAPITAL CORP QTRLY ‍NET INVESTMENT INCOME PER SHARE $0.38​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
